programme.title: The Rise of Hero
programme.desc: Wong Fei Hung travels to Guangzhou and discovers a conspiracy involving city leaders.

programme.title: The Suspect
programme.desc: A North Korean agent tries to uncover the secrets hidden inside the eyeglasses of a dead man.

programme.title: Once Upon A Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: A laborer moves to Shanghai to become rich, and has to use his kung-fu skills to survive.

programme.title: Crazy Fist
programme.desc: To uncover the truth about his friend’s death, a retired MMA champion returns to the ring.

programme.title: Day Zero
programme.desc: Ex-soldier escapes prison into a virus-plagued world, racing undead hordes to reunite with family.

programme.title: Fight Back to School
programme.desc: A freewheeling policeman discovers stolen guns while working under cover at a school.

programme.title: Fight Back to School II
programme.desc: Star Chow resigns when he is made a scapegoat for a botched investigation.

programme.title: Fight Back to School III
programme.desc: Officer Chow Sing Sing is sent to investigate the murder of millionaire Million Wong.

programme.title: The Grandmaster of Kung Fu
programme.desc: A renowned Chinese martial artist engages in a life-or-death battle with a feared Japanese military commander

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: Policeman Bong sees his past come back to haunt him when a sting is attacked by his former protégé.

programme.title: The Final Master
programme.desc: A Wing Chun practitioner must defeat eight martial arts academies before he can open his own school.
